pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. No hidden fees, no surprises.

planUpgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
planUpgrade.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. Downgrades will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

messageLimit.question: What happens when I reach my message limit?
messageLimit.answer: You'll receive a notification when you reach 80% of your limit. Once you hit 100%, you can upgrade your plan to continue receiving messages or wait until the next billing cycle.

contract.question: Is there a long-term contract?
contract.answer: No, all paid plans are billed monthly with no long-term commitment. You can cancel anytime.

aiAssistant.question: How does the AI assistant work?
aiAssistant.answer: Our AI assistant uses LLama technology to analyze incoming messages, classify their intent (lead, complaint, order, info), and suggest contextual responses based on your previous communications and business context.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure and private?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All messages are encrypted end-to-end, we comply with Indonesian data protection laws (UU PDP), and your business data is isolated using namespace technology.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We offer email support for Starter plans, priority support for Professional plans, and dedicated account managers for Enterprise customers. All plans include comprehensive documentation and video tutorials.

aiCustomization.question: Can I customize the AI responses?
aiCustomization.answer: Yes, Professional and Enterprise plans allow you to create custom prompts and response templates. You can train the AI to match your brand voice and specific business requirements.

ecommerce.question: What e-commerce platforms do you support?
ecommerce.answer: We support major Indonesian marketplaces including Shopee, Tokopedia, Blibli, and Lazada. We're continuously adding more platforms based on customer demand, but for this feature is still in progress.
